parameters:
"Buonasera RUUEGAZ come va 
spero tutto beeeene!
Stanotte mi e' arrivato un messaggio strano dal Wladi:
DSTRNZMDNNPTTNDMRDCCDNTLCRSTMLDTTPRCDD...
Ho provato a contattarlo ma non risponde..."

"Ghigno, a me sembrano solo delle bestemmie senza vocali.
DioSTRoNZoMaDoNNaPuTTaNaDioMeRDaaCCiDeNTialLCRiSToMaLeDeTToPoRCoDDio.
Ma potrei sbagliarmi...
"

"Potrebbero sembrare solo delle bestemmie senza vocali...ma nella protomatematica non lineare delle microstringhe si sono visti casi di codifica simile
Sembrano bestemmie ma viste a n dimensioni diventano altro... Comunque non sapete cosa mi e' successo al cazzo"

"Forse ha ragione Luigi. Ho fatto una scansione con il Flipper. al primo tentativo ho acceso il microonde al mi babbo, al secondo ho briccato il router di casa ma alla terza... CAVOLI!... Forse c'è da preoccuparsi..."

"COL CAZZO! Ok andare a ripigliallo in kristomerdistan, 
ma col cazzo che torno a casa sua a mettere le mani in quella merda ataccata con lo scotch(TM) 
che lui chiama server. "

"Allora direi di partire!
Abbiamo un solo mezzo che puo' portarci in KROTZIGISTAN in tempo per salvare la vita al wladi. il CBR!"

"Credo che sia meglio il camper. 
Ci s'entra piu' larghi. Andiamo che senno' si fa tardi e mercoledi' ho il padel"
"A me va bene tutto, l'unica cosa importante e' che in Trozskistan ci siano dei bei trans sugosi. Non voglio trovarmi davanti ad esseri umani con le tette ma senza cazzo. Sarebbe intollerabile"

"LO SAPEVO DIO CANE! Ora tocca stare qui 
a rompese il cazzo...
Troviamo il modo de cavasse dai coglioni"

events.comment: Visualizzazione dialoghi

parameters: "Mi pareva di aver detto che abbiamo bisogno di potenza SMODATA, devi fare di meglio"

"SFORZO SPRAY! Il mio camper lo adora! 
Ma non basta...DATTI DA FARE"

"ORA SI!!! Ma quanto cazzo c'hai messo, 
sei un disagiato (porcoddio).
Allacciati le cinture...Raggiungeremo i 130km/h!!!"

events.comment: Logica Generale Visualizzazione UI
Interazione Oggetti Base

parameters: "Scritte in russo, foto di gente torturata...una tessera punti CONAD"
"Pregevole panca in legno con macchie di sangue"

events.comment: Intreazione oggetti di scena

parameters: "del WD40(TM), dello SFORZO LIQUIDO SPRAY(TM) oppure entrambi"
"GNAMOVESE, io vado in cabina di comando e attracco per la partenza. Te intanto dai energia SMODATA al MILLENIUM CAMPER"

events.comment: Visualizzazione dialoghi

parameters: "Mi pareva di aver detto che abbiamo bisogno di potenza SMODATA, devi fare di meglio"

"SFORZO SPRAY! Il mio camper lo adora! 
Ma non basta...DATTI DA FARE"

"ORA SI!!! Ma quanto cazzo c'hai messo, 
sei un disagiato (porcoddio).
Allacciati le cinture...Raggiungeremo i 130km/h!!!"

events.comment: Logica Generale Visualizzazione UI
Interazione Oggetti Base

parameters: "il Ghigno ha fatto la spesa...mmmh...Sushi vegano al manzo di mele cotogne..."
"La cuccia del Wladi, coperta e pigiama di lana con 35°, quanti ricordi"

events.comment: Intreazione oggetti di scena

parameters: "del WD40(TM), dello SFORZO LIQUIDO SPRAY(TM) oppure entrambi"

"Prigoggechin! Capperi! Che caspita ci fai qui in Kruzistan!
Non sembri morto!"

"Nooo! Tutto karascio'! Io sta bene come pesce!
Ora lavoro in dogana.
Posto tranquillo."

"Voi primo turista con camper...
...volante. Tu mostra permesso atterraggio 
e noi amici come fagiolini in barattolo"

"Questa carta Punti Fragola Esselunga. 
Moglie dice meglio CONAD.
Prego seguire me in stanza di dogana"

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: westboy, daliyoucefmedakram@gmail.com, @bouh
eventsFunctionsExtensions.fullName: Auto typing animation for text ("typewriter" effect)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: AutoTyping
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Animate text to simulate it being written one character at at time (a "typewriter" effect).
description: Animate text to simulate it being written one character at at time (a "typewriter" effect), with a customizable time between each character. Useful for dialogue scenes or visual novels.
- Add the behavior to a Text object (BBText, Bitmap Text object) and choose the interval between characters.
- Change the typing speed with the "Change interval" action.
- Pause the typing and resume it at any time.
- Use the "Skip to end of text" action to give users a way to skip text they don't want to read
- If the text changes, the automatic typing starts again from the beginning with the new text.
- Use a condition to check if the typing finished.
- Use a condition to check if a new text character was added. This is useful to trigger audio effects.
- Use the "CurrentCharacter" expression to know when a specific character was displayed.
The top-down RPG example uses this extension ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://top-down-rpg)).

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Westboy31
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: FlashTransitionPainter
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Behavior for shape painter allows you to paint a color all over the screen for period of time with an effect (useful for simulate flash and transition effect).
description: * __Paint effect:__ Action to paint a color all over the screen for a period of time with specific effect.
* __Flash:__ is a monochrome color appear with fade then disappear with fade out.
* __Vertical:__ is a monochrome color comes from right side then comes back.
* __Horizontal:__ is a monochrome color come from top side then comes back.
* __Circular:__ is a circle which increases from the center and narrows.
* __Paint effect ended:__ event when the paint effect ends.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Paint all over the screen a color for a period of time.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FlashTransitionPainter

events.comment: Disable effect when the game starts.
Avoid default parameter of painter that could make the extension doesn't work.

Initialise position of painter. 
Increment or decrement "_TimeProgressionEffect" depending on direction.

Here this the paints functions of different effect depending on the type chosen by the user.
Detect the direction of the animation and its end.
Type 1 : flash effect.
Type 2 : screen come from top then return.
Type 3 : screen come from left then return.
Type 4 : a circle scale up from the middle then scale down.
The repeat 5 times is used to have clean and smooth edges , especially for circle.
Reset variables.

eventsFunctions.description: Paint Effect.
eventsFunctions.name: PaintEffect
eventsFunctions.sentence: Paint effect type _PARAM4_ of _PARAM0_ with direction _PARAM5_ and color _PARAM2_ for _PARAM3_ seconds

events.comment:
Initialise all variables and then activate the behavior.
If user doesn't assign value to color and type , we take the last value registred.
If user doesn't assign value to timer we take a default value (0.2).

eventsFunctions.description: Paint effect ended.
eventsFunctions.name: PaintEffectIsEnd

events.comment: Detect when the animation ends with a timer which is initialised in PaintEffect function.

propertyDescriptors.label: The maximum of the opacity only for flash
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxOpacity

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Lim98SE
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: MouseHelper
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Turn any object into a cursor.
description: This extension allows to replace the cursor with an object.

- The button behavior has been removed. The button object can be used instead. Some ready to use buttons can be downloaded from the [Buttons pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=menu-buttons-menu-buttons) of the asset store.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Turn any object into a mouse cursor.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: cursor

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Maxwell Coffey, Arthur Pacaud (arthuro555)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: SpriteSheet
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Animate a tiled sprite from a sprite sheet.
description: Animate images from a sprite sheet by using a tiled sprite.
2. Set the tiled sprite image to the sprite sheet image.
3. Add the behavior (horizontal, vertical, or JSON animator) to the tiled sprite.
- For directional animators: Edit the object "Default width" and "Default height" to match the size of a frame.
- For the JSON animator: Set the sprite sheet JSON data in the behavior properties.
5. Use the behaviors action to start the animation (only needs to be run once, like sprite animations).

These behaviors will animate a spritesheet with the images distributed from left to right or from top to bottom. Offsets, row/column, animation speed and frame ranges can be specified to target the desired images.

This behavior allows displaying frames or animations from a more intelligent spritesheet. You can generate a compatible JSON and sprite sheet via TexturePacker using the pixi.js preset. The JSON is formatted like this:

`frames` define each image inside the spritesheet and `animations` are the set of frames that form an animation. For compatibility with the TexturePacker pixi.js preset, the JSON doesn't contain the animation speed, so it has to be specified in the behavior properties.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: PanelSpriteButton
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: A button that can be customized.
description: The button can be customized with a background for each state and a label. It handles user interactions and a simple condition can be used to check if it is clicked.
There are ready-to-use buttons in the asset-store [menu buttons pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=menu-buttons-menu-buttons).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: The finite state machine used internally by the button object.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ButtonFSM

events.comment: The "Validated" state only last one frame.
Make sure the cursor position is only checked once per frame.
Touches are always pressed, so ShouldCheckHovering doesn't matter.

eventsFunctions.description: Reset the state of the button.
eventsFunctions.name: ResetState

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is not used.
eventsFunctions.name: IsIdle

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button was just clicked.
eventsFunctions.name: IsClicked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the cursor is hovered over the button.
eventsFunctions.name: IsHovered

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is either hovered or pressed but not hovered.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFocused

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is currently being pressed with mouse or touch.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPressed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is currently being pressed outside with mouse or touch.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPressedOutside

eventsFunctions.description: the touch id that is using the button or 0 if none.
eventsFunctions.name: TouchId

eventsBasedObjects.description: A button that can be customized.
eventsBasedObjects.name: PanelSpriteButton

events.comment:
Create one background instance for of each state.
Only the instance for the current state is shown.
Place the label over the backgrounds.
Show the right background accordingly to the new state.

Children instances must be resized when the button size change:
- backgrounds for each state are resized to take the full dimensions of the button
- the label is put back at the center of the button

The scale is set back to 1 because it means that the parent instance has the same dimensions as the union of its children instances.
